column3: Latest; Oddar Meanchey province: A farmer plowing his land unearthed a batch of rockets buried since the war
column4: and luckily was not blown up.------ The incident took place at 3:30 pm on 31 January 2019 in Samrong District
column6: a 30-year-old male was preparing a new rice field when he struck the 11 UXOs. He Reported to the police
column7: who came to check.------The police confirmed the rounds were still live and have contacted a de-mining group to come and dispose of them.
